The following nbwrpg poll is now closed.  Here are the 
final results: 


POLL QUESTION: Do you think that US athletes are given 
olympic medals as a compensation for 
what happened in NY? 

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- Well, godammit! Of course!, 0 votes, 0.00%  
- America is justice, so of course not!, 2 votes, 25.00%  
- You're just jealous because Canadians don't have enough money to train good athletes., 3 votes, 37.50%  
- Maybe so, but wait for Canada to play Hockey!, 3 votes, 37.50%  
- Why is Afghanistan not at these games? (I don't know if they are, actually), 0 votes, 0.00%
